text: pavitrabhavanamāya ka'abayeyuṁ, yud'dhaṁ niṣid'dhamāya māsatteyuṁ allāhu janaṅṅaḷuṭe nilanilpin ādhāramākkiyirikkunnu. (atupēāletanne ka'abattiṅkalēkk keāṇṭupēākunna) balimr̥gatteyuṁ (avayuṭe kaḻuttile) aṭayāḷattālikaḷeyuṁ (allāhu niścayiccirikkunnu.) ākāśattiluḷḷatuṁ bhūmiyiluḷḷatuṁ allāhu aṟiyunnuṇṭennuṁ, allāhu ēt kāryatteppaṟṟiyuṁ aṟivuḷḷavanāṇennuṁ niṅṅaḷ manas'silākkuvān vēṇṭiyatre at‌
